alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 2:21AM MST until December 13 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch early this morning. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Iowa, Sioux, Cherokee and Buena Vista Counties. In South Dakota, Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As temperatures slowly warm this morning, freezing rain will change to rain with icing improving after daybreak.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
